channel.title: NPC drops
channel.description:
I'm trying to edit NPC drops on PI base, I saw a tut that said find
[code]public static final int[][] NPC_DROPS = {[/code] in config.java, but I don't have that or anything like it in there.
I have no idea how to add/change NPC drops and this is starting to get very frustrating.

item.title: NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @_Java6 `Java
item.description:
@_Java6 wrote:

Alright, thanks for the help!

Read full topic

item.title: NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

[quote="`Java, post:7, topic:414859"]How many kills before the drop? How do you specify what will be dropping after that many kills? I mean there’s a list of 20+ items after the amount of kills “before the drop”

I appreciate your help, but please be a little more specific :s

Also, how would I add an NPC to this list?

you cannot specify what drops after it if there are 2 items there it has equal chance of picking either one its “random” if you want it to only drop 1 item, delete all the others.

#monster name monsterid:droprate ( lower = more drops) itemid:ammount itemid:ammount

Read full topic

item.title: NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @_Java6 `Java
item.description:
@_Java6 wrote:

How many kills before the drop? How do you specify what will be dropping after that many kills? I mean there’s a list of 20+ items after the amount of kills “before the drop”

I appreciate your help, but please be a little more specific :s

Also, how would I add an NPC to this list?

#NPC:# itemID:amount, repeat?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

[quote="`Java, post:5, topic:414859"]NPCDrops.tsm?
I think I can figure out how to make an NPC drop a certain item now, but
do you know what I would I would need to change in that file to change the rarity of a drop?[/quote]

#sergeant strongstack
6261:150 995:20000 808:129 886:127 391:2 207:2 3051:2 213:2
^^^^
monsterID:how many kills before the drop - itemID:ammount

;3

Read full topic

item.title: NPC drops

item.description:

How do I make it so I control which NPC drops a certain item?

Read full topic
